sn35.163:1.1: Atha kho ayasma mahakotthiko …pe… bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn35.163:1.3: “Yam kho, kotthika, dukkham tatra te chando pahatabbo.
sn35.163:1.5: Cakkhu kho, kotthika, dukkham; tatra te chando pahatabbo.
sn35.163:1.6: Rupa dukkha; tatra te chando pahatabbo.
sn35.163:1.7: Cakkhuvinnanam dukkham; tatra te chando pahatabbo.
sn35.163:1.8: Cakkhusamphasso dukkho; tatra te chando pahatabbo.
sn35.163:1.9: Yampidam cakkhusamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi dukkham; tatra te chando pahatabbo …pe…
sn35.163:1.10: jivha dukkha; tatra te chando pahatabbo …pe…
sn35.163:1.11: mano dukkho; tatra te chando pahatabbo.
sn35.163:1.12: Dhamma dukkha; tatra te chando pahatabbo.
sn35.163:1.13: Manovinnanam dukkham; tatra te chando pahatabbo.
sn35.163:1.14: Manosamphasso dukkho; tatra te chando pahatabbo.
sn35.163:1.15: Yampidam manosamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi dukkham; tatra te chando pahatabbo.
sn35.163:1.16: Yam kho, kotthika, dukkham tatra te chando pahatabbo”ti.
